item.title: How to Switch to Google Fi (2025): Plans, Tips, and Advice
item.description: Here’s everything you need to know about switching from Verizon, T-Mobile, or AT&T to the search giant’s cell service.

item.title: AOL Will Shut Down Dial-Up Internet Access in September
item.description: The move will pinch users in rural or remote areas not yet served by broadband infrastructure or satellite internet. Around 175,000 households still use dial-up internet in the US.
